articles.title: "Concerns Related To Security, Economic Situation...": Jay Shah On Why Asia Cup Was Moved Out Of Pa.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Jay Shah opened up about the decision taken by the Asian Cricket Council to move the Asia Cup 2023 out of Pakistan.
articles.content: The Asia Cup 2023 was supposed to take place in Pakistan but the BCCI was not in favour of the arrangement and after extensive talks, a hybrid model was agreed upon where Pakistan would host four mat… [+2246 chars]
